website_summaries.verdict: An affordable training belt that offers a variety of intensity levels and packs well for easy travel.
pros: Offers six different training modes so you can choose the perfect intensity for your needs
Only requires two 15-minute sessions a day to see results
Lightweight design makes it easy to take the belt with you to the gym or on trips
cons: Gel pads sometimes have trouble sticking to the skin

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect to miraculously have 6 pack abs in any short amount of time. There is no shortcut for that. This product is designed to help tone the abs for better definition assuming you do the rest of the work of burning off the belly fat yourself.
customer_reviews.author: pauletta horn

customer_reviews.title: Back pain
customer_reviews.text: I sit all day at work and I actually use it for my back pain. And it helps a lot. Pads are sticky, so be sure don’t let your kids or pets get hold of it. It is a fun product and other creative usages are completely up to you.
customer_reviews.author: Jake G.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Can feel the muscles being stimulated 👍🏽, but think I’m going to upgrade to a unit that has more pads and covers larger area
customer_reviews.author: Dale Jackson, Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and thin machine as it is. Contains powerful technology. found that very easy to assemble and set up. You can feel how the abdominal s really work. This abs stimulator is in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Soucia

customer_reviews.title: Exercise / message
customer_reviews.text: I got this item over a week now. I used it every day after a long day. It keep my abdomen exercise. That's my weak area. Today I let my honey to use it on his back to release pain. It works great too! 👍
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: nice product for lazy person
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice product for lazy person. he ABDOMEN GEL pad works great, there are 6 different models you can use. Even the MANUAL said not use for one body part for long time, I always use 3-4 different models for one body part. It is fine. The only problem I don't like it is the battery. I use the pad daily , so I have to change its batteries frequently. That costs more.
customer_reviews.author: aliguigui

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy and convenient to use. You can use it at any time at any place. I normally use it when I am cooking. I can feel my abs is stimulated and burning. Good for busy moms who have no time to go to gym for workout.
customer_reviews.author: Elinna

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Completely disappointed ☹️. You get a week of use, if you once 20 minutes a day. The gel disappears and that’s it. The book doesn’t give you any information where to get the gel other to contact them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Boo...
customer_reviews.text: Only worked for about a week. This is the third Ab stimulator That I bought. Everyone of them stop working within a week or two. I wouldn’t suggest buying any ab simulator from any company or person ever.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Fewell

customer_reviews.title: Feels like you just hit the gym
customer_reviews.text: Product came in new and in nice packaging. Vary easy to use, works vary well. After just 10min while useing it feels like you’ve had a full workout.
customer_reviews.author: Vallie

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work from the moment it came out of the package. I can't believe no other reviewer didn't have a unit that would not function.
customer_reviews.author: VTRocker

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like it
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 6 average weight woman I’ve only tried this once for about a 1/2 hour and can barely feel it working any muscles it mostly feels like getting shocked
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick
customer_reviews.text: This comes off so easily. The battery pouch doesn’t stick at all . Should have been cheaper considering how it is made and functioning. The worst product I bought in amazon
customer_reviews.author: gram

customer_reviews.title: Five star
customer_reviews.text: The effect is very obvious. There are 6 gears in the equipment. When you adjust to the maximum gear, there will be obvious tearing. Personally feel that people who are fatter have a certain patience in using this equipment. When used by thinner people, there will be obvious muscle jumping. My roommate used it to experience it.
customer_reviews.author: John LaHaye

customer_reviews.title: POS DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I had it for longer than 30 days yes, did I use it for 30 days nope and it stopped working. Don't waste your money. Personally I'm tired of being taken advantage of and buying crap. The seller should send me a new one. I replaced batteries even bought new gel pads and nothing. Complete waste.
customer_reviews.author: Brant King

customer_reviews.title: Just bought it
customer_reviews.text: It works, I'm sure and I may update the review in the future but my issue is that one of the arm bands is weak, much weaker than the other. I thought it was an issue with the actual receiver, but when I switched them out, I was able to determine that its the actual arm band. The one good band works very well, as well as the ab belt. For me, it's an inconvenience to use one arm band on two arms because one of them barely works. With that, I have chosen to give it a 2. With a half a product, you can't get anywhere above half the rating.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Carter

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: You can't use it while workout and it may come off depends to your belly shape. It's not a magical tool but it's definitely helpful. Also you don't have to change the gel pads every single time but you have to have them, and you need to buy a lot of strong AAA batteries. This device can give you a painful shock at level 10, it's pretty strong with different patterns for vibrations. It would be very effective if you're on diet and using your ab roller ferequently (if you use the ab roller correctly!)
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH G

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working exactly day 29 coincidence ??? Not sure but the return window closed on 29th day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 Stars For Now
customer_reviews.text: This received 3 stars from me simply because the gel strips only lasted me about 6 uses before no longer sticking. I like using the device, it seems to work well. I would recommend more combinations for how the device targets certain muscles, it seems like it more so works the two mid Ab muscles more than the lower and upper. But the gel strips becoming less sticky over usage is my biggest problem. I haven’t used it since because it won’t stick to my abs without me holding it, so I’ll have to look into cleaning them now to get a good stick again. We’ll see how things go from here!
customer_reviews.author: Trez GeeTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product and so far, it will not work at all. It will turn on but that’s it. I have replaced the batteries twice. I plan to try one more time and an sending it back. So far, not even one star but I’ll update if that changes.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Make sure all stimulators pads work
customer_reviews.text: You definitely can feel it I like that part just got it so don’t know about results and I put a two star because full product does not work one of the are stimulator doesn’t work so if you want to use it takes up double the time cause you have to unstick place to other side and use again.
customer_reviews.author: Prime member

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: First day trying it burnt through my skin be very careful where it is placed currently have a burt spot
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: Received mine a while ago. Upon first use, I turned it all the way to max settings. I thought maybe I had bad batteries so I tried new ones, nope, same issue. Maybe it was the program I had it on, nope, all just as bad... I can barely feel it work, and only 2 of the 8 pads work, does not stick at all. This thing is complete junk, do not buy...
customer_reviews.author: Kadamczyk57

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item, it is easy to put on and keep clean and it comes with good instructions about how to care for the pads. You do have to do work to get the abs, this will not turn rolls into muscle! But if you are in shape this definitely give more definition and fullness to your muscles. I did three stars for the pain because I was not really using it for that.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Jason Rollings

customer_reviews.title: can only use lying down
customer_reviews.text: doesnt actually stick to you so you would just have to wear it lying down picture is very misleading
customer_reviews.author: David Bruce Fichtenmayer

customer_reviews.title: Good price that has different strong level, feel it working into my body
customer_reviews.text: After using for more than a week, I'm using this everyday while playing game. The best thing is this one has different level to select, I'm only on level 3 now because at this point I think it's strong enough for me. I hope I will have a lot muscle when I reach max strong level. The price is also acceptable compare to some other brand which selling for over $200
customer_reviews.author: Fey

customer_reviews.title: It Definitely is worth it!
customer_reviews.text: ab stimulators can be effectively used if there are no opportunities for training or as an important component of a physical therapy at the initial stages of rehabilitation after injuries. I after using it daily and increasing the intensity I started feeling and visibly seeing it contracting my muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Boris

customer_reviews.title: i would NOT recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have used other products like this before and the Antmona Abs stimulator is by far the most cumbersome to use. 1st and foremost NO INSTRUCTIONS on how to assemble. so what happens is all the sticky tabs are ruined trying to first remove them to place on device and then you can’t remove the protective plastic covering so it removes the gel from the tabs, ruining them for use. it was ridiculous. now once the tabs were “in place” i did like the various options and programming. however each cycle doesn’t last long and the buttons are so sensitive to any pressure they turn off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check electrical matrix for any cracks.
customer_reviews.text: Used this 2 times. Second time left me with electric burn and now scarring. Small crack noticed on the electrical matrix on abdomen portion. Other than that... I loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: alicia flores

customer_reviews.title: Very good and easy to use, feels like a massage
customer_reviews.text: The product was good and feels great, just be careful and read the instructions carefully or you‘ll make a silly mistake that’ll affect the sticky part that sticks to your body, if you do everything right though, great product
customer_reviews.author: Alex Luis

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced item
customer_reviews.text: I received it the next day after I placed the order. Very fast shipping and I'm very satisfied with this product! I've been using it for three days now. I feel like it helps soothe my muscle pain after workout. Also it is very portable and you can use it anywhere! On the instruction, it says to use it twice a day for 15 minutes. And you will see result in one month. I'll definitely recommend this product to my friends who is looking to stay fit!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Used product
customer_reviews.text: I just received the package and all the bags with the products are open even the gel pads looks burn and product used didn't received a new product
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Show your muscle
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible device - it allows the user to stimulate, grow, and define their muscles while doing an idle activity like reading, watching tv, working... anything! The multiple settings allow for a wide range of muscle engagement and at different intensity settings. I could really feel my muscles being completely engaged, all while watching TV. The device comes with many replacement pads, so you don't have to worry about consumables. After just a week or two of using it I could already start to feel a difference in my muscles!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Does not stick well after a couple of uses The remote it’s too heavy for the glue so u have to be sitting down or laying in bed is better. You cannot be walking around with it as it would fall off. I don’t like the fact that it needs batteries charging will be better and lighten the weight Well see if it works but as in now I’m not happy
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The directions weren’t clear but I figured it out. I’m losing weight but I’m still too fat for the abdominal stimulator to be effective. But, the arm stimulators have been awesome. Definition in my arms AND my hands & fingers don’t tingle or fall asleep any more.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a lot of time to workout since I'm a full time student, work part-time and i'm a mom so i decided to get this abs stimulator and it seems to be doing the trick. I've had it for a couple of months and I put it on when doing chores or while doing homework. You can feel the stimulator doing the job and the electric waves don't hurt. It's also very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: karina

customer_reviews.title: Abs Stimulator
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in hopes of it helping tone my abs area. I try to use it once a day and put it on my abs and arms while doing light chores around the house. The highest intensity I can go up to is number two. Numbers three and four are too extreme for me. I pretty much set it and forget about it. You can feel it working. I think the hardest part for me is the maintenance of the gel pads. It becomes less sticky after multiple use. I Haven’t seen much change using this product on my abs but you definitely have to continue to exercise and eat healthy to see any results.
customer_reviews.author: Dee K.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The stimulator works wonders great for back pain too! It’s very user friendly and works awesome! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use while I'm working out at the gym and it really gives me the edge I was looking for. To be more precise, I'm amazed how much I genuinely enjoy feeling my stomach muscles contract and relax. You can feel the machine working both sides of the stomach muscles as well as individual muscles. Very easy to activate and handle, just followed the instructors and it worked as expected. 100% love this!
customer_reviews.author: ONYEI ORUPABO

customer_reviews.title: Upper abs
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!!! I like to use this in addition to slender tone ab belt that I’ve used for the 10 years because it hits the superior abs more. BUT YOU CAN DEFINITELY USE IT IN ITS OWN. It also hides much easier under clothes since it is not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Viddie31

customer_reviews.title: Great Ab workout
customer_reviews.text: Great product just wasn’t what my husband was looking for since he didn’t want a battery powered one. He wanted one he could charge instead. ITV definitely works well if you are looking for an Ab stimulator.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Wish it came with better instructions.
customer_reviews.text: This item came fast which was great but not much of a user guide with it.. I hope Im using it correctly. It hurts sometimes so I turn it down, the sticky stuff has a tendency to lift off from skin so I can't really do other things while I have it on. Not really sure if its working at all, I'm not impressed with it so far but I will keep trying.
customer_reviews.author: Fumie SP

customer_reviews.title: Doctor recommended & patient/consumer approved.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, very easy to use and can be used while reclining on the sofa watching tv. My doctor recommended this to help “wake my body up”. Using this has definitely made a difference. I recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kelbel

customer_reviews.title: And the ab one hits quite a few muscles
customer_reviews.text: This works great, I love that it is rechargeable. Really gets the muscles jumping. Feels like I worked out the next day. The smaller ones work great on legs and armsAnd the ab one hits quite a few muscles
customer_reviews.author: Tam

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: If I could rate 0 stars I so would. Literally got this and opened up super excited and was completely disappointed. How on earth can you send a product for your customer to use with literally the remotes and control system out of the package ??? All I have is useless stickers. I spend almost $50 for useless stickers and gel pads and two pieces of cardboard
customer_reviews.author: Janissia

customer_reviews.title: Try it.
customer_reviews.text: It really works. When I use it, I can feel it is shaking. I feel the best after exercise. It can continue to burn fat. But if someone don’t do any exercise, want to build muscles depend on it. I think it is impossible.This is not a shortcut,
customer_reviews.author: Captain-Sam

customer_reviews.title: I’d order a different brand
customer_reviews.text: Worked well but the battery back won’t stay snapped. And the pads don’t stay stuck to your skin very well. Constantly trying to adjust everything to get it where it needed to be to actually stay on my skin and stay together
customer_reviews.author: Clair Edmiston

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to tell for results but the product is in good working condition.
customer_reviews.text: Too soon to tell if I get results from using the product but it does give a good shock as the levels gets higher. Baby steps for those who are sensitive to pain. My pain threshold is extremely high so the highest level is just fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky1

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up for this Abs Stimulator
customer_reviews.text: Love this Abs Stimulator. It feels like you’re doing real ab workout, except you’re not on the floor breaking your neck and back. A couple of weeks in and I start noticing some changes.
customer_reviews.author: Tide

customer_reviews.title: Careful, it ships ON
customer_reviews.text: Wow, maybe there should be a hard switch so that it’s OFF when you put in the batteries so you don’t get a shock when it powers up. All 3!!! Arrived next day, will update as I use ( if I survive)
customer_reviews.author: Lorenrenee

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a month
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning I really liked this product. However, one of the arm bands came with the snaps not lined up properly so I couldn't use it at all. The ab stimulator itself was great, (lots of options and intensity levels) until just a couple days ago. It suddenly lost all intensity.. even with it on the highest setting I could hardly feel it at all. I changed the gel pads, and batteries and it still did not make a difference, and that was conveniently a day after I was eligible to return it
customer_reviews.author: Sylvie

customer_reviews.title: Eat better & workout
customer_reviews.text: Product is very flimsy, didn’t stick in well at all. Also felt like a zapping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical but it works!
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical when I made this purchase but it did not disappoint! The adhesive strips don’t last long but they send you extra. I’ve found that it’s easier to just wrap a waist trainer around the product and get double the benefits!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Berg

customer_reviews.title: I was happy with this
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this muscle toner see some improve 3 day i use it but stop working day 5 have a lot lest off power i change the batteries but don't work not happy the all money in the trash
customer_reviews.author: celeste

customer_reviews.title: Great for post workout
customer_reviews.text: I wear this either right after I work out or before bed and it feel like it greatly adds to my workout routine by targeting focused muscle areas. Don't wear it while working out because it will just be an inconvenience and don't over exceed the programming because it is as intense as you can take it.
customer_reviews.author: Sweets

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: I asked for a refund NOT to be sent another THEN.... IM NOT IN THE STATE SO I CANT RETURN SO IM CHARGED FOR 2... FIX THIS NOW AND REFUND MY DAM MONEY! I used this product one time for 5 minutes followed all the directions on how to handle the product properly and it didn’t even stick. It’s garbage .... now I have two! You need to take both back I didn’t even open the second tf
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: Did enjoy the product however The boards to stick the stimulator on when not in use we’re hard to pull the stimulator back off of. The gel pads did not last very long. Could certainly feel the stimulation but wish the pads would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Expecting effect
customer_reviews.text: Over the years, I have seen many of these products in the chaotic media. I finally decided to have one of my own. This was my first contact, so I bought an affordable product for myself. With this muscle trainer, I can train my abdomen after a shower and while lying in bed without sweating. It is easy to assemble and get started. This will not cause me discomfort. I like!
customer_reviews.author: Ziudyle Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Overall opinion
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worked out for a couple of years now and already had abs so this product was meant for helping me tone my abs. The product works it does stimulate the muscle and you will see abs if you also workout. The extra gel pads weren’t good though they didn’t stick like the ones that came on it. This product WILL NOT help you lose weight and it will require you to still workout. It does help a little though.
customer_reviews.author: Chadwick W.

customer_reviews.title: Better products out there don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Product is easy to use and easy to assemble. However it does not do much. It doesn't stick well to the skin and you can barely feel it pulsing you can on its highest setting. Rent for several days to see if there's any difference if I could feel the difference and nothing. I couldn't even feel it pulsing or working until I put my hand on it. Flimsy and a of a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Lina kee

customer_reviews.title: effective supplemental training .
customer_reviews.text: effective way to train specific muscle groups in addition to the regular training. stickt gel pad lasts for few weeks and battery keeps well.
customer_reviews.author: hugh seski

customer_reviews.title: great for office people
customer_reviews.text: this product is awesome,it can help me exercise anywhere. while watching tv,typing in office. i just used twice and i can feel the heat on my belly,hope to see an improvement after one month‘s usage!
customer_reviews.author: fgdf4a33

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I usually work at home many times. When I received this kit, I used it for 2 weeks. now I didn’t see the obvious weight change, But very comfortable, will continue to use
customer_reviews.author: YooYoo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & Effective
customer_reviews.text: While this is no replacement for putting in the actual time required to exercise the ANTOMA Stimulator is effective in helping to supplement your training. Plus it is an added benefit of providing the same benefit of Electrical Stimulation to sore muscles. The only problem I encounter and would caution you with is take your time and pay attention when applying the gel pads because their proper placement is essential.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold S.

customer_reviews.title: Abs stimulator
customer_reviews.text: The abs stimulator works really good after a work out, or even just before one. You can feel it tighten each muscle to form better, I’ve actually toned out from the use of the ab stimulator as well as the arm straps that cane with. Would really like to see what other ab stimulators they have to offer and plan to invest in them even more.
customer_reviews.author: Karter D.

customer_reviews.title: Safer way to get a nice ab exercise without hurting your back with traditional sit ups
customer_reviews.text: Right way to get nice set of abs without doing situps which can actually hurt your back I recommend the product
customer_reviews.author: paulie

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to get more definition in my abs. The product came with sticky gel pads to allow the stimulator to stick to the skin, unfortunately when I used them I felt no Electrical Pulses at all. I ended up removing them and using the product on my skin directly while holding it down. It works really well despite the troubles, and I have seen results and noticed a tighter core after a couple of days of use.
customer_reviews.author: Nick T.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended Abs Stimulator
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with the quality of my new waist trimmer. I used it straight away, just put it on under my clothes and took the dogs for a long walk - so easy to use, versatile and discreet.
customer_reviews.author: Nicele

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this belt. I try to eat right, and I use this belt to help build more muscle and I have had nothing but positive results so far. Just a note of advisement, make sure the area you are using the belt on has moisture, that’s very very important.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Polo

customer_reviews.title: Go the old fashioned route
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to be well-crafted. I like the pulsating that he created. It was very strong and I feel like it works nicely over time. The only thing I will say is that I wish it had more adhesive stickers so that you can switch them out because they seem to lose the stickiness after a few uses. Ultimately, I ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle User

customer_reviews.title: You can definitely feel it working!
customer_reviews.text: I know this is not some magic diet pill and I will not get awesome abs with this alone...but I was not prepared to feel it working like I do! I am actually feeling like I have worked out so it is fabulous in that aspect. I am going to keep using this and hope to update this later with more news.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Marcotte

customer_reviews.title: Product does not work
customer_reviews.text: Thus product is ridiculous. Bad instructions. Never felt any pulse whatsoever. Ridiculous. I just got around to trying it and it is crap. Might as well through it in the garbage. Never again
customer_reviews.author: keyman

customer_reviews.title: Good night time after workout stimulator
customer_reviews.text: I like that the stimulator actually gives your abs a good workout. For me when I turned the settings to level 8 it was perfect. I should have known the pad stickyness would wear out quickly through. I used everyday for a month and it stuck well until the last week. I recommend getting replace sticky pad gel. Best to use when laying down or standing straight up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of feedback about this Abs Stimulator and I believe it works as it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald O. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: I’ve used better ab stimulators.
customer_reviews.text: This product was ok. I feel that it was cheaply made. I also don’t feel that it stimulated my abs well. It just kinda shocked the surrounding skin. I’ve used abdominal stimulators in the past that have been much more effective. This one was also uncomfortable to wear. I wish I could return it, but it’s past the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: The controllers keeps falling, they can't get still when your moving, second the gel doesn't stick it keeps falling. I waste my money on this product please don't waste yours
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Only 1/2 of them work?
customer_reviews.text: It very easy to use but the simulation only seems to work on one side so the machine doesn’t really stimulate? The sticky pads only lasted 3 uses as well and I used them on clean skin. Was hoping to give it 5 stars or to be able to return it but missed the deadline, oh well.
customer_reviews.author: mikayla de carli

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The product is easy to use. And has multiple intensity ratings and different pulse patterns to satisfy what you are looking to do. It is easy to put on and take off and it can be stored nicely in the box that it came in. You can use it at any time you want. I like to use the ab stimulator more than the arm bands. I currently work from home sitting at my desk so I can get a work out and work at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont do it
customer_reviews.text: Does not stimulate unless u have on high... the ab part only stimulates the top area. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: destiny

customer_reviews.title: It's quite good.
customer_reviews.text: Experience is very good, very convenient products, muscles are really contracting, stick to the position can clearly see muscle changes. It's been used several times.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Great for lazy people !
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for people who are lazy like me! It is very simple and easy to use. I usually put it on for about 30 mins and then it will start sweating. So far I’ve been using it for a couple times and I already see some results. It is worth the price and very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product
customer_reviews.text: The abs stimulator part works really well; you can really feel the electricity coursing through your abs. The arm pieces, not so much. I find that they come off my skin really easily, so I'll often have to hold them in place while using this part of the product. The storage works really nicely for the product and it's nice that it comes with extra gel pads for later (or mistakes).
customer_reviews.author: Siobhan Ortolano

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am recommanded by a friend on purchasing this item, want to see if it is as good as she told me. Easy to assemble and easy to use. But I will feel better if there are more detail on the description of function difference of each level/program on the user manual.
customer_reviews.author: Kada

customer_reviews.title: Nothing bad about this product
customer_reviews.text: It’s very easy to assemble just make sure you have 6 aaa batteries. Easy to use just sticks on you skin. And very comfortable and great muscle repair.
customer_reviews.author: Shamone

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I am a very lazy person, but the fat on my stomach tells me that it is time to find a way, I think I found it, it allows me to burn fat at any time, simple to use, look forward to a thinner self
customer_reviews.author: XiaoKK

customer_reviews.title: Great for aches and pains!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item, it is easy to put on and keep clean and it comes with good instructions about how to care for the pads. I use this almost daily. I wear it with a waist shaper to help hold in place while doing chores around the house. I use them in many places including my upper and lower back for aches and pains. I dig it and it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M.

customer_reviews.title: If you really want ABS, please do it at the gym
customer_reviews.text: Well, bought this because I got tired at doing abs in the gym, this thing does not work imo. it does not really stick on you and it gives me no result. I guess abs takes no shortcut but hard work and a healthy diet. BRB, going to work on my abs
customer_reviews.author: Kaiwen

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, Silence
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for watching tv and playing mobile games. Keep you in spot mode every time.
customer_reviews.author: colakang

customer_reviews.title: READ BEFORE PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: This is so dangerous. If you read the directions it says about 10 times that this product has a high change of causing death or severe pain. Also it feels like you are getting shocked when you use the product. I don’t feel like me muscles are getting any exercise. It only feels like you’re getting shocked and the directions were not very clear on everything. I waisted my money on this product. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: cynthia jones southerland

customer_reviews.title: Belt portion stopped working after 20 uses
customer_reviews.text: Belt portion stopped working after 20 uses and it was not batteries or the controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Ok but didn’t do anything
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t notice a difference and only one side felt like it was working but not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I haven’t used it long enough to see if it works but I’m happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work them abs!
customer_reviews.text: Strong stimulation, I can feel my abs working and burning. I use it after my workout. Very durable, they don't stretch and seem to be long lasting. Very sticky but easy to remove and reuse.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used as much as I wanted, because I keenforgetting to put on. However the times I did use it did what it said and made my muscles be stimulated and moving. Super easy to use and attach. So far I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Malloriew

customer_reviews.title: Ab Stimulator
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to assemble and use. Each level of stimulation feels like an electric shock to your muscles but after getting used to the feel of the stimulation it becomes bearable and with continuous use you can tell the difference after using it. Each level becomes more intense and works the muscles which in turn tones it. I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Sammie_Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The devices that worked were great. One of the three never worked.
customer_reviews.author: S. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Waist of Money
customer_reviews.text: This product is another scam, it did not work at all. Did not stick, useless. Spend a fortune on batteries to operate it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Charles

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Item received fast, not as intense as expected but it's very comfortable and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Had to get fresh batteries to make the stimulator pulse strong, yet once I did the product worked great. The ab stimulator was easy to attach and the gel pads adhere great to the skin. Haven't used the arm stimulators yet but I cant wait to give them a try
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Abs
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy not worth it don't make the same mistake I did
customer_reviews.author: J

product_meta.title: Antmona Abs Stimulator, Muscle Toner - Abs Stimulating Belt- Abdominal Toner- Training Device for Muscles- Wireless Portable to-Go Gym Device- Muscle Sculpting at Home- Fitness Equipment, Black
feature_bullets: In order to help you get in the best shape of your life, our team has designed the ultimate training device: that allows you to lose fat and workout your muscles from the comfort of your home.
The solution is simple: 15 minutes of the device twice a day and you are going to see the results on your abs in no more than 3 months.
The stimulating belt allows you to train your abdominal muscles and sculpt your body just the way you want it.
All you have to do in order to get the perfect abs is to place the belt on your abs, choose one of the 6 different training modes and enjoy.
The 2018 new technology provides with vibrations that work your muscles and help you get in the shape you want in no time.
